quotes.body: Okay. I found love of my life and now all I want is find her location and put her in suitcase and take her home

The last poem of the night, and guess what, it still contains you. You fill my mind and heart; your smile is so bright, it lightens up my darkness. The way you look at me makes me melt. Your scent hungers me today, even though I know you'll never love me back. Yet the pain feels so good.
गम को तुम कही छुपा के रखा करो, कोई और ढूंढ पाए या न पाए, अरजित सिंह जरूर ढूंढ लेगा
